Message: * A friend wanted you to see this item from WRAL.com: http://wral.com/14896339

— Goldsboro police are searching for a suspect in the fatal shooting a man early Sunday.

Officers responded to an emergency call in the 800 block of Crawford Street and found the man lying in the street, suffering from a gunshot wound.

He was taken to Wayne Memorial Hospital, where he died.

The man was identified as Marcus Montrell Mclean, 29, of Goldsboro.

Anyone with information about the crime is asked to call detectives at 919-58-4218 or 919-580-4210, or call Crime Stoppers at 919-735-2255, or text tips to 919-222-4230.
